title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 300.7 - Coordination of services by the social services district
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 300.7 - Coordination of services by the social services district

State Regulations
(a) To insure
provision of services that strengthen and maintain family and individual living
and best promote the welfare of each individual receiving assistance, care or
services, each social services district shall coordinate the skills and
experiences of its income maintenance, medical assistance and services
divisions. (b) Each social services
district shall establish coordinating procedures from intake to case closing, clearly delineating the responsibilities of each division as they relate to
cases of mutual interest. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
300.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
